lead_paragraph: World number one and defending champion Novak Djokovic marched imperiously into the second round of the Australian Open with a dominant 6-3 6-2 6-4 victory over Chung Hyeon on Monday.
snippet: World number one and defending champion Novak Djokovic marched imperiously into the second round of the Australian Open with a dominant 6-3 6-2 6-4 victory over Chung Hyeon on Monday....

headline.main: Dominant Djokovic Marches On in Melbourne
headline.print_headline: Dominant Djokovic Marches On in Melbourne
